LanguageData.Emancipate.label: emancipate
LanguageData.Emancipate.description: A warden will free this slave.
LanguageData.Execute.label: execute
LanguageData.Execute.description: A warden will execute this slave on the spot by cutting.
LanguageData.Imprison.label: imprison
LanguageData.Imprison.description: A warden will imprison this slave. Once imprisoned, they can be recruited, or enslaved once again.
LanguageData.NoInteraction.label: no interaction
LanguageData.NoInteraction.description: Wardens will not interact with this slave.
LanguageData.Suppress.label: suppress
LanguageData.Suppress.description: Wardens will periodically intimidate the slave to increase their suppression level and reduce the chance of rebellion.
